IntApp Going Virtual
All new and the majority of long-time IntApp clients run our software in a pure-virtual environment. The latest clients to follow suit include:
Arnold & Porter LLP Blank Rome LLP Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP Goodmans LLP Ice Miller LLP Norton Rose LLP
For more information about migrating to a virtual platform, email Neal.Vora@intapp.com.
Announcing Wall Builder 4.4
We're pleased to announce the availability of Wall Builder 4.4. This latest release introduces Matter Team Manager, which allows practice and matter team leaders to directly control and update composition of matter teams, and associated access permissions through a simple, web based interface.
This release also brings improvements to the notification and logging engines. More detailed information is available on the IntApp Customer Community.
Wall Builder Momentum Continues
The 2010 ILTA Technology Survey identifies IntApp Wall Builder as the most adopted confidentiality software product for law firms. Report data show that 74% of large law firms (700 or more lawyers) using commercial software to enforce ethical screens to secure access to confidential information have standardized on IntApp Wall Builder. Of firms with 350 to 699 lawyers using commercial confidentiality management software, 60% have chosen Wall Builder. For more information, visit www.intapp.com.
IntApp Resource Center Updates
We have recently updated the IntApp Resource Center with a collection of IntApp partners that are certified in working in conjunction with IntApp Integration Builder projects. These pages are designed to give you exposure to additional development resources for your integration projects. For more information about IntApp's own professional services offerings, please contact Kathy.Englar@intapp.com.
We have also recently added even more rule templates to our ever expanding Rule Library. For access and information, please email IntApp Support at support@intapp.com.
New rule templates have been added for the following applications:
-NetDocuments -Recommind Desiciv -LegalKEY -Elite 3E -HR Pro -StarLaw
If there are rule templates you'd like to see, please let us know by emailing Jeff.Armbrecht@intapp.com.
IntApp Client Success Recognized
Field Fisher Waterhouse's use of IntApp Time Builder to increase lawyer billing accuracy and improve firm financial performance resulted in finalist honors in the 2011 KnowList in the category of "Business Project of the Year" and the 2010 Legal Week British Legal Awards in the category of "Best Use of Technology."
Kirkland & Ellis has won the LTN "Most Innovative Use of Technology in a Law Firm" for their use of IntApp Wall Builder to enforce confidentiality policies and track compliance across the firm.

Risk Survey Reports
IntApp recently distributed the "2010 Law Firm Risk Management Survey: North American Edition," which presents data gathered from 80 law firms across the US and Canada. Topics include: Risk Policies and Education, New Business Intake Practices, Lateral Hires/Defections, Confidentiality Management and Compliance Tracking and Verification. If you have not received your copy, please email Lea.Simon@intapp.com.
IntApp will be distributing a UK edition of the Risk Management Survey in the coming weeks. The survey presents data gathered from 25 law firms based in the UK and includes topics: Risk Policies and Education, Confidentiality Management and Compliance Tracking. If you would like to receive a copy, please email Lea.Simon@intapp.com.

IntApp Webinars
We have several upcoming webinars in the works. Look out for events on topics including: using IntApp integration builder to accelerate the adoption of Elite 3E, integrating with cloud technologies and risk management.
On Wednesday, February 23rd, we will be hosting our second web-based Integration Builder training session. This complimentary, 2 hour session will focus on testing and troubleshooting. This training session comes in a new series of offerings IntApp is making available to existing clients to help them refresh and advance their Integration Builder development skills.
Participants are invited to submit questions and topics of interest ahead of time so we can tailor the content to to your needs. For more information, email Lisa.Hern@intapp.com.
We also recently hosted a clients-only Wall Builder roadmap webinar, detailing new and upcoming features. If you are a Wall Builder client and missed the webinar, but would like to hear firsthand about new features, contact Brian.Skinner@intapp.com.
